data.name: Clocker - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Get the original soundtrack of our puzzle game Clocker and listen to the 13 tracks used for the game by Salt Sound Studio. MP3 files are included in it.



Track Listing:
01. The Time Has Passed
02. Past In The Dream
03. Hover In Mystery World
04. See Weird Things
05. Scared Things Coming
06. Feel A Bit Anxious
07. Nearly Give Up
08. But Hope Exists
09. World Become Bright
10. Remeber Our Daily Life
11. They Will Inspire You
Ex1. Light Of Dawn
Ex2. Blink In Daily Life

Once you've purchased, you can access it by doing the following:

1. Right-click Clocker in your Steam game library.
2. Click "Properties."
3. Click on the Local Files tab.
4. Click on "Browse Local Files."
